synopsis.text: Among st the arid dunes of the Middle Eastern kingdom of Asran, a clandestine airbase known as Area 88 houses a ruthless band of mercenary pilots. Once a promising airline pilot, Shin Kazama finds himself ensnared in a three-year contract with this deadly squadron, deceived by his once trusted friend. With his dreams of marrying his beloved Ryoko shattered, Shin must now navigate the treacherous skies, seeking either the fortune of $1.5 million or the endurance to survive until the end of his contract. Japanese photojournalist Makoto Shinjou descends upon Area 88, intent on capturing the harrowing tale of Shin's plight. As Shin confronts the grim realities of war, he faces the daily struggle of defying death, with the faint hope of one day reclaiming his lost life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
